mapper.select: SELECT list_id AS listId, user_id AS userId, name, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM todo_lists WHERE user_id = #{userId}

WITH ins AS ( INSERT INTO todo_lists (user_id, name) VALUES (#{userId}, COALESCE(#{name}, 'My ToDo')) ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO NOTHING RETURNING list_id ) SELECT list_id FROM ins UNION ALL SELECT list_id FROM todo_lists WHERE user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
